BIDS_formatting package¶

Submodules¶

BIDS_formatting.anonymize_conhect module¶

BIDS_formatting.anonymize_conhect.anonymize_conhect(base_dir: str)¶

Takes a path to a dataset organized as {subject_id}/Vi, and convert it to sub-i/ses-i. Produce an equivalence table with correspondence between subject_ids

Parameters:

base_dir (str) – base directory

BIDS_formatting.anonymize_conhect.correct_names(base_dir: str)¶

Convert subject ids to sub-{i} in a given dataset.

Parameters:

base_dir (str) – base directory

BIDS_formatting.heudiconv_conhect module¶

BIDS_formatting.heudiconv_conhect.atoi(text)¶

heudiconv specific function

BIDS_formatting.heudiconv_conhect.execute_bids_formatting(base_dir: str)¶

execute bids formatting given a base directory + For next release the heuristic.

Parameters:

base_dir (str) – base directory

BIDS_formatting.heudiconv_conhect.natural_keys(text)¶

alist.sort(key=natural_keys) sorts in human order http://nedbatchelder.com/blog/200712/human_sorting.html (See Toothy’s implementation in the comments)

BIDS_formatting.heudiconv_parameters module¶

BIDS_formatting.heuristic_conhect module¶

BIDS_formatting.heuristic_conhect.create_key(template, outtype=('nii.gz',), annotation_classes=None)¶

Function to create a identificator between series description and nifti filename

BIDS_formatting.heuristic_conhect.infotodict(seqinfo)¶

Heuristic evaluator for determining which runs belong where

allowed template fields - follow python string module:

item: index within category subject: participant id seqitem: run number during scanning subindex: sub index within group

Module contents¶

Sub module featuring programs for BIDS (Brain Imaging Data Structure) formatting

pytracto
